Title: Enacts the New York civil rights cold case records collection act
Summary: Enacts the New York civil rights cold case records collection act; directs the state archivist to create a civil rights cold case records collection; creates the civil rights cold case records review board which shall assist the archivist in the collection of civil rights cold case records.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to enacting the New York civil rights cold case records collection act
